title: Poster, "Pastore DePamphilis Rampone, New Headquarters", 1987
signed: Signed in print in gray:  Paul Rand
inscribed: Inscribed in print in lower third of sheet, in white:  Pastore DePamphilis Rampone; in lower left quadrant, in yellow: New Headquarters:/ in white:  303 Paris Avenue South/New York, NY 10010/212 477 3300; in lower right quadrant, in white: Computer Typography/Printing/; in gray:  Halftone Reproductions/in white: Color Transfers; lower left corner, in white:  Printing: PDR Halftone Reproductions
description: On black ground, in the upper one-third of sheet, a circle divided into white, blue, yellow, green and red color bars, inside of which are the company initials (P over D R) which are also formed out of the same color bars.  Beneath the circle to right of center in white:  Pastore DePamphilis Rampone.  In lower left quadrant, the new address in yellow: New Headquarters:. Beneath this, spaced in three lines, in white:  303 Paris Avenue South; New York, NY 10010;  212 477 3300.  In lower right quadrant, spaced in four lines, in white:  Computer Typography, Printing; in gray:  Halftone Reproductions; in white:  Color Transfers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Pastore DePamphilis Rampone, New Headquarters", 1987.
1987. Offset lithograph. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-22.
